english.segment1: Pictures on a doorstep and no lack of hesitation. Need a drummer, cause I've got imagination. You know we're going places I don't wanna go. Just stand off, I'll stack your face and pretend you look good
english.segment2: We don't wanna play because we've tracked an education. Lead us when you see we've got the motivation. You know we're going places I don't wanna go. Just stand off, I'll stack your face and pretend you look good. You know we're going places I don't wanna go. Just stand off, I'll stack your face and pretend you look good
english.segment3: You know we're going places I don't wanna go. Just stand off, I'll stack your face and pretend you look good. You know we're going places I don't wanna go. Just stand off, I'll stack your face and pretend you look good
